Colorful Birthday Cake

Back to Home

Ingredients

  • 2 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
  • 2 1/2 tsp baking powder
  • 1/2 tsp salt
  • 1 cup unsalted butter
  • 1 3/4 cups sugar
  • 4 eggs
  • 1 cup whole milk
  • 2 tsp vanilla extract
  • Food coloring (various colors)
  • Buttercream frosting

Instructions

  1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour pans.
  2. Mix flour, baking powder, and salt.
  3. Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
  4. Add eggs one at a time, then vanilla.
  5. Alternate adding flour mixture and milk, mixing gently.
  6. Divide batter into bowls and add food coloring.
  7. Pour colored batter into pans, bake 25-30 mins.
  8. Cool layers, assemble with buttercream frosting.
